user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows the sign-in page for Newegg's website on a mobile device. Users can enter their email address and click the "SIGN IN" button to log in. Alternative options include receiving a one-time sign-in code, signing in with Google, or continuing as a guest. A link is also provided for new users to sign up for an account.
history_actions: click on the Chrome app icon located at the right and bottom part of the screen.
click on the browser's address/URL bar located at the top-middle.
click on the search suggestion for newegg.com located at the upper left.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the trash bin icon (means a delete icon) located at the middle-left side of the screen.
click on the trash bin icon (means a delete icon) located at the left and lower part of the screen.
click on the "CONTINUE SHOPPING" button located at the middle and lower middle part of the screen.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
type in the content: "logitech g pro "
click on the search suggestion "logitech g pro" located at the upper left part of the screen.
click on the first result item Logitech G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse with price $78.85 located at the upper left part of the screen.
click on the "ADD TO CART" button located at the middle and bottom part of the screen.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the bottom-left.
click on the "SECURE CHECKOUT" button located at the middle bottom.

think.Thought: The user has completed the steps of adding the Logitech G PRO to the shopping cart and selecting checkout. Now, they are on the sign-in page of Newegg. To proceed with checkout, the user will need to either sign in or continue as a guest. Since the current screen shows the sign-in page, I will need to either log in with the provided email or proceed as a guest.
Future Action Plan: Click on the 'CONTINUE WITH GUEST CHECKOUT' button located at the bottom part of the screen.
